original_title: Maestro: Great Conductors in Rehearsal & Performance
overview: This documentary, featuring world-renowned European maestros Karl Bohm and Karel Ancerl, highlights the crucial roles and responsibilities that conductors take on in classical concert rehearsals and performances. Bohm is known for his stewardship of the Vienna Philharmonic and the London Symphony Orchestra, while Ancerl led the acclaimed Czech Philharmonic, along with the Toronto Symphony Orchestra.
title: Maestro: Great Conductors in Rehearsal & Performance
